name: Off Road Quad Bike Sim
description:
If you would like to drive ATV, give a try this extreme off-road simulator. Get into your quad and experience the real ATV driver emotions - xtreme speed, drift and power. In this game you're a quad driver. The goal is racing against the time to pass all the checkpoints. Off Road Quad Bike Sim is not easy but you can do it because you're natural born racer!

FEATURES
- Beautiful HD graphics and real looking 4 wheeler vehicles
- Realistic & dynamic ATV simulation & driving physics
- Awesome & powerful Quad Racing
- Requires your best quad bike racing skills
- All kinds of ATV simulator challenges
- Works on both phones & tablets
- FREE to play
